name: Land of Beasts
description:
High Fantasy Action RPG

Survive in a harsh environment controlling your Hunter and Beast duo. You can switch out your controlled character at any time and the counterpart will be controlled by AI. You can also grab a friend and have them jump in at any point by pressing start on a controller.

By default the first controller will be assigned to player 2. Just press start during the game to join.
If you want to use a controller for player one you have to enable this in the options menu.

#action #adventure #rpg #roguelike #multiplayer #localmultiplayer #coop
